threats.heading: Threats
threats.subtitle: Enterprise-grade cybersecurity built for today's threat landscape
threats.paragraph1: Protect, detect, and respond to cyber threats with enterprise-grade solutions built for the realities of today's threat landscape. Roaya Cybersecurity Solutions delivers advanced cybersecurity services and solutions in Egypt and across the MENA region with globally aligned best practices.
threats.paragraph2: We help you reduce your risk exposure, prioritize what matters, and prevent likely attacks before they disrupt your business. Our approach integrates security across your cloud, on-premises, and hybrid environments.
threats.paragraph3: Our methodology leverages AI-assisted analysis – human-led and AI-accelerated – to speed up threat detection and response. All AI processing uses Roaya's own models on secure, privacy-preserving infrastructure, ensuring your data stays protected.

q3.question: Do you provide on-site support in Egypt?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Got questions? We've got answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, contact our team.
faq.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a1: We accept bank transfers, credit cards, and can arrange custom payment terms for enterprise clients. All prices are in Egyptian Pounds (EGP).
faq.q2: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faq.a2: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and downgrades apply at the next billing cycle. We'll prorate any differences.
faq.a3: No, there are no hidden setup fees. The price you see is the price you pay. Implementation and onboarding support is included in all plans.
faq.a4: All plans include technical support via email and phone. Professional plans get 24/7 priority support, and Enterprise clients have a dedicated account manager.
faq.q5: Do you offer a free trial?
faq.a5: We offer a free consultation and demo to help you understand how our solutions fit your needs. Contact us to schedule a personalized demonstration.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Roaya IT ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services. Please read this policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal data.

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.description: Information automatically collected when you use our website:

howWeUseInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInformation.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

items.provideServices: To provide, maintain, and improve our IT services
items.communicate: To communicate with you about our services and respond to inquiries
items.improve: To analyze usage patterns and improve our website and services

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences, understand how you use the site, and improve your browsing experience. Cookies contain information that is transferred to your device's hard drive.

items.understand: Understand how you interact with our website
items.secure: Keep your account secure and prevent fraud
items.improve: Improve our services and user experience

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.intro: We use the following categories of cookies on our website:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility. You cannot opt-out of essential cookies as they are strictly necessary for the operation of our website.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. We use Google Analytics to track visitor behavior, measure site performance, and identify areas for improvement.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: These cookies track your online activity to help us deliver more relevant advertising and measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns. They may be set by third-party advertising networks with our permission.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.content: These cookies remember your preferences and choices (such as language or region) to provide a more personalized experience. They help us remember settings you've applied to the website.
